title: 20% more gpu memory usage on resnet
body_html:
Been testing with resnet 50 when I noticed that a batch of 128 / gpu no longer fits in multi-gpu. I'm seeing around 20% more gpu memory being used now (see below).

'old version' commit hash 5000914
'new version' commit hash 7ddcb91

resnet50    | batch 16/gpu | batch 32/gpu | batch 64/gpu
old version | 2.96 GiB     | 4.52 GiB     | 7.97 GiB
new version | 3.55 GiB     | 5.60 GiB     | 9.81 GiB
body_text:

body:
Been testing with resnet 50 when I noticed that a batch of 128 / gpu no longer fits in multi-gpu. I'm seeing around 20% more gpu memory being used now (see below).

'old version' commit hash https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/50009144c02155be6afd4570e93f453e73904a8e
'new version' commit hash https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/7ddcb91c7f84c3da8cc9f7fba28a3ae9ecd6cc45

```
resnet50    | batch 16/gpu | batch 32/gpu | batch 64/gpu
old version | 2.96 GiB     | 4.52 GiB     | 7.97 GiB
new version | 3.55 GiB     | 5.60 GiB     | 9.81 GiB
```
